body:
Found a lost cat

I found a lost cat in my apartment building. I searched and asked around if there’s an owner looking for her but found none so I’m keeping her. Before this all I’ve ever done is feed stray cats. But since I moved places I no longer do that. I want to ask for tips and suggestions. Also Her hair keep falling all over my clothes, is it worth worrying ? I have 4 teenage chicken as well so I’m hoping a house cat won’t have a problem with them, although the chickens are kept safe in our wide balcony. She’s really lovely, was very hungry amd scared but after a lots of petting she’s following me around and looking at ease.

He goes to take a bite out of it when he suddenly hears Yoongi’s angry voice. “YAH! Put me down you fucking brat what the hell do you think you’re doing?” Jungkook immediately drops him out of shock. “Hyung?! What the hell?! Why are you Shooky?!” “Fuck if I know or if I care. Just put me back in bed so I can go back to sleep I’ll figure this shit out later.”


Hoseok

Hoseok has no idea what is happening. He goes to look in his bathroom mirror but realizes he is too short to do so. Okay something is seriously wrong. He climbs up onto the counter and Mang is staring back at him instead of his own face. Literally lets out a screech of utter terror and passes out on the counter. At the sound of hearing Hoseok’s scream Jin walks into the bathroom. Not seeing Hoseok anywhere he assumes he must have imagined it. “Ugh these brats can’t even clean up after themselves.” He picks up what he thinks is just a plushy when Hoseok suddenly wakes up and starts screaming again. Cue Jin being terrified because “What the fuck why is this Mang Plushy screaming just like Hoseok.” “It is me you moron!” Jin just assumes it’s some new feature with a new plushy type and sets in on his bed ignoring the calls for help coming from the toy. Hobi crawls back under his covers and tries to sort out a way to fix this.

 

Jimin

“Oh my god I’m adorable. I can’t believe I woke up as Chimmy this is the best day ever.” Jimin literally couldn’t care less. He’s so happy to be in his BT21 character’s body because he just thinks he is that much more adorable and will get even more love and affection now. Literally just a cuddly little bug and spends most of his day with Taehyung who keeps fawning over how cute he is. “Tae aren’t you I don’t know.. bothered? Surprised? Like at all?” “Hmm nope! Don’t think so Chim. Let’s just enjoy this day together and then we can figure out a way to help you tomorrow if you are still in Chimmy’s body okay?”

Taehyung

“OH MY GOD I AM ADORABLE! THIS IS THE BEST DAY EVER!” Hoseok woke up to the sound of Taehyung shouting. “Yes Tae we know you’re adorable. But really? It’s too early go back to sleep, okay?” “No Hoseok you don’t understand I am Tata!” “Sure you are Tae. Go back to sleep.” Taehyung huffed as he walked over to the door to swing it open and yell at Hoseok only to realize he couldn’t reach the door. He stretched his arms out and opened the door. “Now do you believe me?” Hoseok would literally just stare, say nothing, and begin walking back to his room. Taehyung stretched his arms out again to wrap himself around Hoseok’s leg. “Hobi where are you going?” “Back to sleep I am obviously delirious so just do me a favor and shush and let me go back to bed for a while.” He picked Taehyung up and held him as he went to sleep, with a completely unbothered Taehyung absolutely content with his situation.


Jungkook

“Okay, I know everyone says I remind them of a bunny but this is just ridiculous. Am I going crazy? Should I seek help for a mental health evaluation?” He walks into Jimin’s room, and as he sees him sleeping peacefully he suddenly has an urge to draw on his face. Realizing he already has a marker in his hand he drew a Cooky like eyebrow on his face and began giggling to himself. Jimin woke up and just assumed he must be dreaming so he went back to sleep. He then went into Jin’s room and sat at the edge of his bed, pretending to be a plushy. Jin woke up to see the plushy sitting right at the edge of his bed and was startled. Jin got up to use the bathroom and came back to find the plushy sitting on his dresser instead. Jungkook would just mess with the members all day making them think a haunted Cooky plushy had invaded the dorms as he chuckled mischievously to himself.

summary:
i wanted to scream in frustration. he only smiled back.
“i’m just saying, it’s a good deal,” he said.
“i’m not here to make...
body:
i wanted to scream in frustration. he only smiled back.

“i’m just saying, it’s a good deal,” he said.

“i’m not here to make deals!” i shouted. “i’m here to take you hostage! you, specifically you! and i’m not leaving without what i want!”

he raised his eyebrows and puffed out a breath, scratching the back of his head.

“man, there’s really no convincing you, huh?”

my jaw dropped.

“do… do you even know who i am?”

“nope.”

i froze.

the most famous artist across the seven seas didn’t recognize the most famous pirate across the seven seas.

“oh, wait… don’t tell me you’re that crimson fox lady!”

tonight was going to be a long night.
